content:
Based on discussion and review with the Pharmacy WG today, and specifically getting answers to some questions raised on the Cooking with CQL call yesterday, we've updated the CumulativeMedicationDurationFHIR library. Specifically, the removal of boundsPeriod from consideration for calculating the interval covered by a dispense, notes in the library documenting the answers to the questions raised:
https://github.com/cqframework/CQL-Formatting-and-Usage-Wiki/blob/master/Source/Cooking%20With%20CQL/54/CumulativeMedicationDurationFHIR4.cql#L284
@Michael Ryan @Eric Whitley
